TopicTitle: So Who has Killed Valentina already ?

Articles.Content:
Alas,

She died in an out of control Capsule return and explosion (I had batt juice, but think it ran out and lost sas hold), I had stepped away from system for a moment ... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

I tried to land a very early rocket-powered plane in the dark in IVA. I ended badly.

RIP in peace, Valentina. RIP in peace. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Not me, but in counterpart, I killed Jeb in a test to the reentry dynamics of a lander can ( results: with some work you you *can* survive a reentry with the can ... but it helps to bring parachutes, since the varying Isp with atmo pressure makes power assisted landings harder to judge accurately ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) )
Not me, yet. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I did,crashed a plane by turning because of broken aero making planes unable to turn,or spin without breaking to a million pieces.

She was my test pilot for my first attempts at spaceplanes.

It took me several tries to add decouplers and parachutes to the cockpit. I don't think she's a good swimmer.
She is safe in orbit around Mun. Return will be more exiting as its my first Mun return in 1.0 but pretty sure it will go well.

I killed her in a deleted save that I forgot I was doing Iron Man mode on. She was in a plane that crashed, but she's back in my new save ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
I was testing a plane with her. It flew okay, but I crashed it pretty much instantly.
First try with an heavy Mk3 SSTO. While in flight, I wanted to look the Iva at work... But I hit the EVA button instead... Bye Valentina!

Confirm that the little guy can escape from death after 20km free falling ... ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

![dnK0jgN.png](http://i.imgur.com/dnK0jgN.png)
She was the first one to make orbit, but then the flippy capsule thing happened on reentry, and boom

I just did, because I wanted to test if they added an Game Over system.

Did they cancel it, or does it require something more than killing 4 kerbals ate max reputation penalties?

Reentry effects are real, and can strike you the wrong way the moment you don't respect them:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/YHd1V)

This was totally unplanned and unexpected. I have a sense now what mission control managers felt like during a certain shuttle accident...

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/au1pgv2BN5E?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T15:34:38Z" title="04/28/2015 03:34  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by inigma**

For my old save she was the first Kerbal in space. Also the first Kerbal whose capsule flipped and vaporized during reentry. 

Well, technically it wasn't me who killed her, but [bug 4790](http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/4790)...
Well I was messing around with HyperEdit and... um....
Not yet, but a few interns had their tenure cut short.... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
She spontaneously combusted when eva'ing out of an inline cockpit that rested on the Kerbin surface.

> 
> For my old save she was the first Kerbal in space. Also the first Kerbal whose capsule flipped and vaporized during reentry. 
> Well, technically it wasn't me who killed her, but [bug 4790](http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/4790)...

This is what happened to my Val as well ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

The first thing I did was fire her and all the other showboating orange-suits. Its hard to play no-respawn ironman with three celebrities to coddle with "G-tolerances" and "secondary chutes". All of the replacement applicants were female. Odd. So far female kerbals have a far higher mortality rate, and we may have the old sailor's "women are bad luck" superstition floating around the astronaut barracks. This is silly, only female pilots were applying so naturally only female pilots would crash, but then that tourist was female... and that scientist... but Mitch returned from his flight just fine...
I'm playing no respawn, so I'm very carefull with the main crew. All other recruits are expendable.
I don't think I'll ever end up killing her because I just fire her along with the other three. Also thinking of resurrecting my renaming mod so I never have to see the starting three four again.

Only in the simulator\* has she (and Jeb) died. So far.

\*Testing designs, reverting flights
She goes with the 3 guys to space, to be the first 4 in space, but after that she gets designated as my plane pilot.
I strive to not kill any of my kerbonauts. So no O(riginal)4 is alive and well in my game.
